video_prompt: Rabbit's head gently turns, eyes shifting with curiosity. Its subtle blush deepens, whiskers twitching slightly. The painted cloud background subtly swirls, pastel colors blending and re-forming like slow-drifting smoke. White dots flicker and drift across the scene, resembling falling snow or sparkling dust, while larger blurry circles subtly pulse. The bunny's fur texture appears to gently ripple.
image_prompt: Cute white rabbit with blue eyes, centered, facing left with curious expression, fluffy, delicate ears, pink blush, subtle whiskers. Vibrant pastel gradient background of painterly clouds/abstract brushstrokes. Soft, scattered white dots effect. Watercolor paper/canvas texture. Anime/cartoon style for rabbit, abstract painterly background. Whimsical.
refined_video_prompt: Rabbit's head gently rotates, its gaze shifting with increasing curiosity. A subtle blush deepens on its cheek, while whiskers delicately twitch. The painted cloud background subtly swirls, pastel hues gracefully blending and re-forming like slow-drifting smoke. White particles flicker and drift, resembling falling snow or sparkling dust, as larger blurry circles subtly pulse. The bunny's fur surface visibly ripples.
